column1: # Modeling the Turnover of Biomass in the Global Food System.
# Chalmers University of Technology and GÃ¶teborg University
# Note: Wirsenius regional definitions differ from UN M49 regions in some cases:
# - Greece classified as East Europe (not Southern Europe)
# - Iran classified as South & Central Asia (not Western Asia)
# - Southeast Asian countries classified as East Asia
# Northern Africa -> North Africa & West Asia
# Latin America and the Caribbean -> Latin America & Caribbean
# Antarctica -> North America & Oceania (no better fit)
# Western Asia -> North Africa & West Asia (except Iran which is S&C Asia)
# Northern Europe -> West Europe (except Baltic states -> East Europe)
# Southern Europe -> mostly East Europe (Balkans) or West Europe
